DOC.detailed_description: Heroin addiction serious health problem available medical treatment prevent relapse . Naltrexone medication currently use treat substance addiction . The purpose study compare effectiveness naltrexone , guanfacine , combination naltrexone guanfacine reduce drug relapse heroin addict . This study enroll individual addict heroin complete prior detoxification program one two addiction treatment hospital St. Petersburg , Russian Federation . Upon complete detoxification program 7-14 day , participant period inpatient rehabilitation . During 3- 4-week inpatient stabilization period , patient screen study participation . Once stabilize , participant begin 6-month treatment phase study . During phase , randomly assign receive one follow drug combination daily basis : 50 mg naltrexone guanfacine placebo ; 1.0 mg guanfacine naltrexone placebo ; 50 mg naltrexone 1.0 mg guanfacine ; naltrexone placebo guanfacine placebo . All participant designate family member responsible supervise medication compliance . Study visit occur twice monthly . Participants receive clinical management medication compliance counsel visit ; family member also take part counseling session . Outcome measurement include drug relapse , medication adherence , withdrawal symptom , HIV risk factor , psychiatric symptom . Follow-up evaluation occur 3 6 month follow end treatment .
